name: Correlation Recommendations Complete
description: Sent to the user when account correlation recommendations are complete.
subject: Account Correlation Recommendations Complete for $sourceName
body:
Dear $__recipient.name,

#set($url=$__global.productUrl + '/ui/a/admin/connections/sources/' + $sourceId + '/settings/account-correlation')AI recommendations for account correlation configurations have been generated for $sourceName.
Go to the Account Correlation page to review your correlation recommendations.

Thanks,
The $__global.productName Team
